name: ingenious-stream-youtube
description: A curated collection of YouTube-hosted movie metadata for streaming applications

scripts.extract: npm run fetch-tamil-playlist && npm run fetch-tamil-keywords && npm run fetch-telugu-playlist
scripts.transform: npm run transform-tamil && npm run cleanup-tamil-playlist && npm run cleanup-tamil-playlist-01
scripts.load: npm run filter-tamil && npm run group-tamil
scripts.pipeline: npm run extract && npm run transform && npm run load
